definitions.body: flame, blade;—´[[ל]] abs. Ju Jdg 3:22, Ju Jdg 3:22 + 2 t.; cstr. Ju Jdg 13:20 + 5 t.; pl. [[לְהָבִים]] Is 13:8; cstr. [[לַהֲבֵי]] Is 66:15; —

flame of altar, Ju Jdg 13:20, Jdg 13:20 ([[הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] ´[[ל]])) [[אֵשׁ אוֹכְלָה]] ´[[ל]], of ´[[י]]'s is judgement Is 29:6, Is 30:30, Is 66:15 (in all ‖ forces of nature, whirlwind, thunder, earthquake, rain, hail, etc.); fig. [[פְּנֵיהֶם]] ´[[פְּנֵי ל]] Is 13:8 (i.e. hot with excitement, cf. Di); sim. Joe 2:5 [[אֵשׁ]] ´[[כְּקוֹל ל]] (of rush of locusts); fig. of breath of crocodile Job 41:13.
of flashing point of spear Job 39:23; blade of sword Na 3:3; in prose, Ju Jdg 3:22, Jdg 3:22.
